entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
